 Returns the list of channels for the given group electrodeGroupID.
int getSamplingRate () const
 Returns the sampling rate of the system in hertz.
int getNbSamples (int electrodeGroupID) const
 Returns the number of samples in a spike for the given group electrodeGroupID, or zero if the element could not be found in the file.
int getPeakSampleIndex (int electrodeGroupID) const
 Returns the sample index corresponding to the peak of the spike for the given group electrodeGroupID, or zero if the element could not be found in the file.
int getNbFeatures (int electrodeGroupID) const
 Returns the number of features used in the spike detection for the given group electrodeGroupID.
int getVoltageRange () const
 Returns the voltage range of the acquisition system in volts, or zero if the element could not be found in the file.
int getAmplification () const
 Returns the amplification of the acquisition system, or zero if the element could not be found in the file.
int getOffset () const
 Returns the offset store in the session file, or zero if the element could not be found in the file.
void getClusterUserInformation (int pGroup, QMap< int, ClusterUserInformation > &clusterUserInformationMap) const
 Gets the map of cluster user information.
